definition[0]: to look for something, especially by moving a lot of things around
example[0]: James began poking about in the cupboard, looking for the sugar.
definition[1]: to try to find out information about other peopleâ€™s private lives, business etc, in a way that annoys them
example[1]: Stop poking around in my business!
definition[2]: to spend time in shops, markets etc looking at nothing in particular
example[2]: I spent Sunday afternoon poking around an old bookshop.
